description:
Billboard updates the Billboard 200 albums chart each Tuesday (with adjusted release schedules on some holiday weeks), reflecting data from the previous week (Friday-Thursday). Each Billboard chart is then dated “Week of (date of the upcoming Saturday)”.

This market will resolve according to the number 1 album on the Billboard 200 chart dated “Week of January 31, 2026”.

This market will resolve as soon as the relevant chart is published. If the Billboard 200 chart for the specified week is not published within 14 calendar days of the expected release date, this market will resolve to “Other”.

The resolution source for this market will be the Billboard 200 chart for the specified week (https://www.billboard.com/charts/billboard-200/).

events.title: Billboard 200 #1 Album Week of January 31

groupItemTitle: KPop Demon Hunters - KPop Demon Hunters Cast (Soundtrack)
question: Will KPop Demon Hunters by Soundtrack be the Billboard 200 #1 album for the week of January 31?
